thread.title: Brandon Armstrong does LeBron James impression with bad travel at Celebrity All-Star Game
thread.title_full: Brandon Armstrong does LeBron James impression with bad travel at Celebrity All-Star Game

author: Dan Sostek (daniel.sostek@performgroup.com)
title: Brandon Armstrong does LeBron James impression with bad travel at Celebrity All-Star Game
text:
â€” CJ Fogler (@cjzero) February 18, 2017 
West coach Michael Smith was audibly furious about the no-call, screaming "What is that? He took six steps!" He then compared the travel to James getting away with the call . 
Part of his frustration might have came from the scoreboard, as Smith's team fell behind 17 points following the make. I'm not sure how the officials missed that call, but I'm hoping it'll show up on the game's last two minute report. Watch This
